charges.charge_description: 8:1325.P CONCEALMENT OF FACTS ABOUT REENTRY (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 4-29-99: Deft sentenced to time served. Fine in the amount of $100.00 and Special Assessment in the amount of $10.00 imposed. Deft placed on six (6) months unsupervised/supervised release. As a special condition, Deft is not to re-enter the United States without the prior permission of the Attorney General. (1)
